# idsec_cce_aws_organization_account (Resource)

CCE AWS Organization Account resource, adds AWS accounts to an organization.

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `account_id` (String) AWS account ID (12 digits) to add to the organization
- `parent_organization_id` (String) CCE onboarding ID of the parent organization
- `services` (Dynamic) List of services to onboard with their resource configurations

### Optional

- `_` (List of String) List of onboarded service names (e.g., dpa, sca)
- `display_name` (String) Human-readable display name shown in CCE UI
- `duplicated_services` (List of String) Services deployed both in this account and in a parent organization
- `id` (String) CCE onboarding ID for the account
- `onboarding_type` (String) Onboarding type: standard (UI), programmatic (API), or terraform
- `organization_id` (String) CCE onboarding ID of parent AWS organization if account belongs to one
- `organization_name` (String) Display name of parent AWS organization if account belongs to one
- `parameters` (Dynamic) Service-specific configuration parameters, keyed by service name
- `region` (String) AWS deployment region where CCE resources were created
- `scan_probe_interval_seconds` (Number) Wait time between scan probes in seconds (default: 3)
- `scan_probe_max_retries` (Number) Maximum scan probe attempts when account not discovered (default: 20)
- `status` (String) Overall onboarding status (e.g., Completely added, Partially added, Failed to add)
